itis.description: Secondary school diploma, IT specialization. Basic knowledge of some programming languages ​​and key concepts in the IT field.

unipd.title: University of Padua
unipd.description: Bachelor's Degree School of Sciences, IT specialization. In-depth knowledge of many programming languages, both functional and object-oriented. Acquisition of best practices in the field of software development regarding its life cycle and management of the organization of the development team through agile methodologies.
